quetzal_greeting: In order to access the records page, you must be signed in.
congratulations_book_completed: Congratulations, you have reached the end of this book.
unsubscribe_text: 75% of the proceeds go to the First Circle of Chief's Disciples for distribution to the tribal unification efforts of the indigenous tribes and to the teaching of these sacred records.  Your ability to access the records will remain until the proper subscription time is expired.
about_trisummit: Sacred Records is a product of Trisummit Technologies LLC located in Tucson, AZ.
beta_testing: This App is in Beta Testing
beta_testing_text: Please report anything not working in this application to brian.nettles@trisummit.io.
banner_text_1: Numerous indigenous records and teachings are released for the first time.
banner_text_2: 75% of the proceeds go to the First Circle of Chief's Disciples to support teaching centers and economic growth on indigenous lands.
proper_billing: This information is important for proper billing.
delete_personal_data_text: This will delete your name and email address from the account.
delete_account_text: This will delete your account including purchase and subscription history.  You will be logged out of the application and if you log in again, your original account will be recreated; however all historical data will be lost.
profile_settings_text: Allows update of given name, family name, and email address.
delete_profile_text: By deleting your personal information, it removes your name, email address, and Google Photo from the users table.  It also removes your name and email from the purchases and subscriptions table in the database.  UserID is retained as it is necessary for application functionality.
cancel_subscription_text: The Sacred Records Subscription contains ancient records and teachings found over all of the Americas.  75 percent of the proceeds go to tribal unification efforts and to the teaching of these records at events.  Please consider keeping your subscription alive. Your ability to access the records will remain until your monthly subscribed time is expired.
copyright_protected: Copyright The First Circle of Chiefs Disciples.
make_account_active: To make your account active, enter the username and the 6 digit number you received in an email.
apple_subscription_text: Subscribe here as an Apple in app purchase to access the ancient records and lodge teachings of the indigenous people of the Americas. 75% of the proceeds go to the First Circle of Chief's Disciples which is dedicated to the teaching and rising of the indigenous people on all of the Americas. The cost is $9.99 per month.  Unsubscribe anytime.
android_subscription_text: Access the indigenous records of the Anishinaabe, Mayan, Incan, Salish, Dene and others. The records are beautiful teachings of their true history. 75% of the proceeds go to tribal unity efforts and to the teaching of the ancient records to the people.
donate_text: Book of Mormon Heartland is a non-profit 501(c)3 organization dedicated to assisting in the unity movement of the indigenous people throughout North and South America.  The organization is very much aligned with The Mayan Quetzal Governance Council and The First Circle of Chief's Disciples. The expenses of the movement are heavy.  We are building unity of numerous indigenous tribes.  We are finding ways to help economically and spiritually as we teach the ancient records to the people making them aware of their true history. Please assist in the movement by donating here.
privacy_policy_text: Click below to view the Privacy Policy
terms_of_use_text_trial: The books in the Sacred Records tab are free for the first seven days.  After the seven days are expired, you will need to subscribe.
terms_of_use_text:
- Title of auto-renewing subscription : Sacred Records Monthly Subscription.
- Length of subscription : 30 days from signup with auto renewal every 30 days.
- Price of subscription: The price $9.99 USD per month in the United States. Other locations outside of the United States may have a different price based on Apple and Google policies.
- Terms of Use (EULA) is found at https://trisummit.io/sacred-records-terms-of-use/.
- Privacy Policy is found at https://trisummit.io/sacred-records-privacy-policy/.
terms_of_use_text_1:
The Sacred Records app has the option for users to sign up for a monthly subscription. The subscription is auto renewing and will remain in effect until cancelled by the user.

 - Title of auto-renewing subscription : Sacred Records Monthly Subscription.
- Length of subscription : 30 days from signup with auto renewal every 30 days.
- Price of subscription (IOS): For IOS the price $9.99 USD per month in the United States. Other locations outside of the United States may have a different price based on Apple policies.
- Price of subscription (Android): For Android the price $9.95 USD per month.
- Terms of Use (EULA) is found at https://trisummit.io/sacred-records-terms-of-use/.
- Privacy Policy is found at https://trisummit.io/sacred-records-privacy-policy/.
terms_of_use_text_2:
The subscription can be terminated at any time. Upon termination, you may continue to access subscribed content until the monthly subscription date has passed.

terms_of_use_text_4:

terms_of_use_text_11: Specifically excluded from application to this Agreement is that law known as the United Nations Convention on the International Sale of Goods.
cancel_android_revenue_cat_subscription_: All subscriptions after December 12, 2025 were made with Google using Revenue Cat.  To cancel your subscription with Google, click the cancel button below.
cancel_android_stripe_subscription_text: By clicking the button below you will cancel all Stripe based credit card subscriptions and give you the opportunity to cancel any Google subscriptions you may have.
